senses.synonym: 01285602-a (inspiring awe or admiration or wonder; \""New York is an amazing city\""; \""the Grand Canyon is an awe-inspiring sight\""; \""the awesome complexity of the universe\""; \""this sea, whose gently awful stirrings seem to speak of some hidden soul beneath\""- Melville; \""Westminster Hall's awing majesty, so vast, so high, so silent\"");02368344-a (surprising greatly; \""she does an amazing amount of work\""; \""the dog was capable of astonishing tricks\""
